website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and fitted, this vest is designed for the active person to wear while working out.
pros: Inside zipper pocket holds electronics and small valuables
Offered in small, medium, or large
Velcro side closures let you adjust the sizing
Knitted polyester is durable and breathable
cons: This vest is not in compliance with worksite regulations and is best suited for working out

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reflective vest for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be part of a small emergency kit for my car. If I'm stuck on the side of the road changing a tire I'd wear this to be more visible. It fits well, and should be able to fit over a jacket, and is highly reflective. This product is on the cheaper side and I can't recommend it for constant daily use, like a runner or walker. I don't think it'd hold up. But for occasional use and for the price I think it's a 5 star purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, but does the trick. Very reflective. Just what you want for an early, dawn jog.
customer_reviews.author: D. Flores

customer_reviews.title: I wish it came in a 2x or 3x I got a large if it's kind of snug I probably got to lose some weight
customer_reviews.text: Works Fantastic Four youths in the summertime I need to wear something but flective at all times while I work so this is real good I can wear a regular shirt and still have that on so I can be seen day or night how was your day
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Definitely Go Up 1 Size
customer_reviews.text: I use this for running now that the time changed and I do most of my running in the evenings. It fits great, a little lose on the back and neck, however, a little tight on the belly region. But I don't even notice it, even with two bike lights on each side of the vest. Definitely recommend as it's a good price for what you're receiving. I've used it now about 4 times and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: RockThePond

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, bright, and handy pocket!
customer_reviews.text: I ride a RadWagon in a town where almost every corner is a "death trap" from inattentive drivers. I love that this vest is very minimal in coverage, particularly around my arms and mid body. It definitely gets attention, and the handy "inside" pocket is great for my phone, keys or credit card instead of my pocket (when I'm not using my basket). Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Forman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice vest
customer_reviews.text: Great vest - I use it for running at night and it fits over anything I want to wear. Hasn't caused any chafing and it has a nice large pocket on it. It does run a bit small so I'd order a size up (I usually wear a medium or large - extra medium haha - and the large was a bit snug but fit fine).
customer_reviews.author: aakers79

customer_reviews.title: A must have item for anyone out and about at night.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was needing for when I take my dog for walks at night. Very reflective. I usually wear women's small to med. I ordered Large. It fits over my bulky winter coat as well as over just a shirt. Is a little baggy over shirt, but am not going for fashion...just wanting to be seen and stay safe. I also like the extra feature of zipper pocket inside vest to put keys, cell phone..etc. Am thinking of ordering another, just to have a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday, and I am impressed and will order another small size for my son. It will make us more visible riding our bikes, and thus much safer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: and the seller recommended "medium, " which fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the seller asking about sizing, and the response was very helpful. I'm a male, 5'7", 150 lbs., athletic build, marathon runner. I wanted a reflective vest to wear over one shirt (i.e. not over a jacket), and the seller recommended "medium," which fits perfectly. Worth the cheap cost. Thin material, light, breathable fenestrations, perfect for running. Would suggest making the Velcro longer so that it can fit people of different waist sizes (though just fine for me).
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product For the Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this reflective vest. It's great to wear in the evening (or whenever) when you are out exercising. It's super easy to put on and comfortable. I bought a large (even though i wear a small /medium) because I sometimes wear a big down puffy jacket underneathe it. It also has acrylic patches to make it smaller.
customer_reviews.author: JoyfromItaly

customer_reviews.title: Real Reflective!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my two brothers who run and ride motorbikes. They were really impressed with how reflective these vests are and made them more visible on the roads. They even received compliments from their friends on how their vests provide them safety given the quality of the reflective parts. Now, I am going to buy some more for my brothers and even for myself and my husband for when we fly our drones. Thank you Flectson for helping us being safe!
customer_reviews.author: FlyGold

customer_reviews.title: Happy with price and quality
customer_reviews.text: The Flectson Reflective Vest for Running is exactly what I wanted. Both my wife and I run. We don't always run at the same time so I wanted a vest that was adjustable so we could share it and this one fits that bill. I am 5'7" 165 lbs and the medium fits me and my wife is under 100 pounds at 4'9" and we have no issues sharing this vest. The reflectivity is great on both the front and back side of the vest and during daylight the fluorescent yellow is really bright. Happy with price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy - Great Vest
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father in law who walks every evening. Arrived today and the quality surprised me. For the price, I was expecting less but was pleasantly surprised. Reflectivity is excellent as well. As for the fit, bear in mind what you will be wearing under the vest when choosing a size. While it definitely fit my FIL over his medium weight coat, the large was slightly snug over the coat but will be perfect as the weather warms up and he switches to a lighter (or no) jacket.
customer_reviews.author: DJReda

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lighter weight reflective vest to wear over shirts and light jackets. It's perfect! The inside pocket is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Being a year round runner, I picked this up for my early morning and evening road runs. Very glad I did. It has worked better then other reflective shirts I have tried. Very light and does not restrict movement. I am 5'10 165lbs and got a Large so to fit over the mult layers. I will order a Med for spring/summer runs. I am so happy with this vest that I have started using it during my daytime runs as well. Yes, it helps drivers see me then too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: road runner

customer_reviews.title: Haven't been run over yet.  Great for Ragnar Races
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I have yet to be run over while wearing it, so that's a good thing. Time will tell. It looks a bit ragged after being washed, but it should be good for another few races, so I call that good value for money. Front pocket was a bonus though, I did not use it. Loved the snug, adjustable fit with the side velcro.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ondatje

customer_reviews.title: XL fits a regular XL guy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased or my husband who is 6 ft tall andweighs ~215 pounds. He can wear it over his bulky black leather jacket for visibility when he walks the dogs at night. He uses the pocket to carry dog treats! The velcro tabs seem secure, the vest is easy to put on and off. He has only used it twice since it arrived three days ago, but so far no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Very visible, generous sizing
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, highly visible vest. The pocket is very a convenient addition, and I use it more than I originally thought I would. A note on sizing: I am female, 150lbs, 5'6", and ordered a medium. It is still loose, even with the velcro sides adjusted to the minimum. It doesn't bother me to wear it loosely, but it does twist/move a bit when I'm jogging. FYI, in case that's important to you.
customer_reviews.author: K Grove

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for runners
customer_reviews.text: I like to run and bike in the early morning hours, which means its often dark during my morning workouts and I need something reflective. This vest is light weight and easy on/off. It's fluorescent green color also makes it very visible during daylight hours. It folds small enough to stick into a pocket when not wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Kobe

customer_reviews.title: Ragnar Used
customer_reviews.text: Used in a Ragnar race and actually saw several of this exact vest out there running. No issues. I will say that there is a review out there that mentioned the stitching for the Velcro coming undone, so whenever I disconnected the Velcro, I would do so holding the Velcro to keep the pressure off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mildewman

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable, visible
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a good vest for running and cycling. It is lightweight, easily adjustable at the waist, and highly visible in the dark. I especially like that the zipper picked is on the inside. Although this makes accessing it more difficult, that make me feel like it is more secure. Overall, a great product for people who like to be active at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Burns

customer_reviews.title: Like this vest especially because it is large enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: We live in the country (no street lights, fast vehicles) and high-visibility clothing is a must for walking, cycling, etc. Like this vest especially because it is large enough to fit over many winter layers. Great price means I will order a few more for family members.
customer_reviews.author: VermontReader

customer_reviews.title: Great running vest!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest (size small) for my wife to run or walk the dog in pre-dawn hours. The vest is sized perfectly, easily worn and the adjustable velcro sides are perfect to stop slippage. THe inside zipped pocked is a nice touch for phone storage. Highly visable from yards away. It was exactly what we were looking for. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cwynar

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for running outside in the AM when the sun is not up yet. Works perfect- good fit and don’t even notice it is on over running short. Velcro on the sides is effect for adjusting. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hanna

customer_reviews.title: No Tan Lines!
customer_reviews.text: The pocket feature is big and a very nice addition! Easy on and easy off. It folds nicely right into my road bicycle zipper pouch. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Leigh Wallace

customer_reviews.title: For $11, you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bib that is light, well-designed and decent quality. It is sized for your body, not your body plus lots of outer layers. Keep that in mind when ordering. I am 5'11", 170# and Large is a nice size for me with a base-layer and light jacket. I'd want a bigger one for use with a coat.
customer_reviews.author: escifres

customer_reviews.title: She likes it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She is a woman size small and it fits. It fits her and she is extremely happy with it. Only drawback is the pocket is inside the best so her mace is stored in a zipper inside the vest. A bit of an access problem it's an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and reflective qualities.
customer_reviews.text: Very light, comfortable and the pocket is a plus. Good reflective qualities also. I had to get a different size due to what I wear for winter walks but the exchange was fast and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: I weight 105 lbs have 26 inch waste. The small fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this vest. Not overly thick but adjusts to fit over bulky clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great value Hi Vis vest for running
customer_reviews.text: Perfect vest for my recent Ragnar race. I saw many on other runners too. Fantastic customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: TuneCollector

customer_reviews.title: Easily seen
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, made me feel safer, comfortable you don't even know you have it on. I found nothing negative about the vest. I use it mostly for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Non nonsense, high visibility, high quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a high visibility vest with the following characteristics: 1. Good quality 2. Enough velcro area to stay connected to my body 3. Good fit to avoid becoming a parachute 4. Reflective tape 5. Breathable 6. Doesn't make me look like a DOT employee For a 31" waste at 6 feet tall, the Small version is a good fit. The pocket (as shown in picture) has a nice secure zipper, I will likely purchase another in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bib
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I'd call it a bib rather than a vest. It's sides are wide open giving excellent air circulation. Its large reflective panels front and rear plus shoulder and side patches are great for night time protection and it has a bright yellow mesh body for day time visibility. While I wear large shirts, I wear small vests. At first I thought the S/M was too small for me. It's "belt" is at the base of my rib cage, about 16" down from my shoulders. But this is perfect. My forearms don't brush against the bib or its Velcro fasteners. Those Velcro patches adjust from about 32" to 40", so it works with me without or with a coat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cycling
customer_reviews.text: Chose a size up if you plan to wear it on your winter coat. You can then easily adapt the size when summer will be there!
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for runners
customer_reviews.text: The vest arrived as described in a timely manner. I have worn it on numerous nighttime runs and found it to be lightweight, well constructed, and clearly visible to passing motorists. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KDF

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Up Safe!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an Amazing product!! I recommend it, for anyone running or walking at night. I walk the dog twice at night and this product has been, and is the BEST for safety protection.
customer_reviews.author: M. Del Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love that this is not the normal one size fits ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is not the normal one size fits all that I'm usually struggling to keep on my shoulders. Runs a tad smaller than the sizes indicate. It will be great for the summer, but won't fit a warm coat under it.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted for safety
customer_reviews.text: I got this for additional safety when riding my motorcycle. It is highly visible and reflects well at night. I was concerned that it might blow open at higher speeds but the Velcro has worked very well. Reasonably priced and quick delivery. I recommend it,
customer_reviews.author: gordon

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and does what it’s meant to do. I feel more comfortable allowing my son to take out the dog at night with this on.
customer_reviews.author: Mona_atl

customer_reviews.title: I've been looking for the perfect reflective vest for a while and finally found it
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for the perfect reflective vest for a while and finally found it. I really like that this one easily slips over my head and has velcro side tabs to adjust the fit. I'm quite small and most vests are swimming on me, but with the adjustable sides this fits very well., either over bulky clothes or not. Also the inside chest pocket is great. It's well made and I feel so much safer riding my bike now.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for running in dim lighting
customer_reviews.text: I feel so much safer running in this vest in poor lighting. Due to a busy schedule I often cannot run during daylight hours, but must do so in the early morning or early evening. After I started wearing this bright reflective vest I have had drastically fewer incidents with drivers nearly running into me. I ordered a size small at for me it seems true to size. I am happy with this vest and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace V.

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!
customer_reviews.text: This pirchase was for my husband, a daily runner with our dog. It's worked out really well, being light weight and highly visible. The pocket works great for holdong a battery pack to additional lights that he wears during dark hours. It came quickly and seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Bartimole

customer_reviews.title: at best.
customer_reviews.text: Very visible in the dark. Don't expect this to fit over a coat if you're planning on using during dark winter walks. This is intended to be used with a sweatshirt or smaller, at best.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Super bright, Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a super-hero, deflecting cars with a single step..."pshoom!, pshoom!" Exactly what I needed and hoped for. I'm 5'4" and about 130. The S/M fits but I could have used a little longer velcro to hold it more snugly. I didn't realize there is a zipper pocket inside on the front and that's a great bonus for holding my phone so I can listen to podcasts while I run. I highly recommend you join the legion of Super Car Repelling Runners and order this today.
customer_reviews.author: Runner Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great fit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a vest to be more visible when out walking or jogging. I looked at numerous offerings on amazon, and chose this vest based on great price and ratings. Several of the reviews stated concerns about the sizing, but I knew I would be able to return if it did not fit. I am female, 5’9” and 170 lbs and the Large fits me perfect and can fit over a sweatshirt. Zippered pocket is handy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect.
customer_reviews.text: I run early in the morning, typically before sunrise. This vest is lightweight, fits well and makes me feel safe due to the extreme visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kotz

customer_reviews.title: Works well and matches my outfit
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easily. Can be worn in warm weather. It's really yellow; and it reflects. I wear it over my cycling garb for added visibility. This vest plus my stylish black cycling shorts make me the envy of all my friends. Of course, my 15 year old daughter thinks otherwise. But what does she know?
customer_reviews.author: Dennis the Menace

customer_reviews.title: Good fit over my coat.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2" tall and weigh about 110 pounds. I am a night walker, not a runner, and I wanted a vest that would fit over my medium weight winter coat. The size s/m was perfect for this! If I was a runner looking for a snug fit over a tank top, it would have been too big. It is fairly easy to put on and take off, and does not hamper movement.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Smith

customer_reviews.title: The front pocket is nice, too
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my eleven year-old son so we can do some summer night cycling. He rides in front of me. Even when he is far ahead the vest reflects well from my headlight beam. The front pocket is nice, too. I read the other reviews, so I was aware of the size issues. The size I bought fits great and the adjustable velcro waist means it can easily fit over a windbreaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Love the deep sides
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity of this vest, with the deep sides so I don't rub on it while I'm running. It does have a pocket in the inside of the front which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: A great Christmas present for a walker
customer_reviews.text: My husband has gotten concerned about walking when the light is low so he wanted to find a reflective vest to wear. I got him one for a Christmas present. I'm sure he will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Library Lady

customer_reviews.title: Terrific reflective vest - easy to get on and off - folds into a small rectangle
customer_reviews.text: This vest is perfect for city biking. Bright and reflective, easy to get on and off, it fits close to the body over my coat. Doesn't flap around or get twisted or tangled like my old one. The velcro attaches to my backpack, as well, if I'm carrying it. There's a small zippered pocket in the front of the vest for ID or a bit of cash, or a phone. It folds small enough to carry in a purse or a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: martin berg

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent reflective vest. I use it for early morning running and I know that cars see me from quite a distance as they give me a wide berth when passing. Although I don't think it is designed for running it works well for running and is not at all restrictive. I would not run in the early morning hours without it. Light weight, easy to get on and off and basic which is what I want in a reflective vest. Appears to be well made. I plan to get another in a larger size for winter running when I have layers on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Covers comfortably at/below belly button
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Mine a large and my wife's a small. Covers comfortably at/below belly button. Previous ones I've owned barely covered the chest. Visibility is great. I kind of wish access to the pocket was on the outside, but can see the value of security having it on the inside brings, depending on the area you exercise in. I was not compensated for this review. Jim S.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vest and it's exactly what I was looking for. Very lightweight, you don't even know have it on. Several reflectors, highly visible in the dark. So inexpensive yet very well made. I am very happy with the choice I made over all of the others out there. I definitely recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright color and super reflective stripes. Strong velcro: make sure it doesn't stick to other parts of the vest which it could possible damage. Although it says it comes in 3 sizes and I ordered medium, mine is marked S/M. It fits OK but with no room to spare. I'm not that big of a person, I usually would order a medium in women's sizing. This fits snugly over a lightweight jacket but probably wouldn't fit over a winter parka.
customer_reviews.author: alooknac

customer_reviews.title: I started wearing this vest during my commutes to and ...
customer_reviews.text: I started wearing this vest during my commutes to and from work. I was very worried about visibility, but this little baby keeps me highly visibly. Has a little pocket on the inside front which helpful for keys, phones, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect reflexive vest!
customer_reviews.text: Great vest! Just received it and tried it out tonight. So light you forget you have it on, extremely visible and easily adjusted. It was hot and humid out and was still very comfortable! A must have for walking, running or simply being out at dark! Thanks for such a great safety product!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Fine product; fits well
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. It lays flat on you (instead of gaping). In one of the pictures it shows the bottom band below the waist. For me, it was right at my waist.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the dark, early winter midwestern walks. I was skeptical of the quality because of the price point. Very durable and the Velcro adjustments are well made. I have one for me and one for my wife. Will pick up a third to add to our roadside emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Boone JR

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Xmas because he has started walking to work. It's only 1mile, and mostly through a park trail, but I wanted it for when he has to walk through the neighborhood and because it's now dark by the time he walks home. I got him an XL and it fits over his winter coat great!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great visibilty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest since biking my commute has me on the road before dawn. A coworker passed me and commented I was easy to spot from quite a distance. I wish I had bought a size up since I sometimes carry a backpack and I put the vest on my bag, making me slightly less visible from head-on. Nice quality material as well and the pocket is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for early AM dog walking and PM running!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! I purchased this because my neighborhood does not have sidewalks and the street lights are relatively dim. I typically walk my dog before sunrise and in the winter, I go for runs after sundown. This vest fits perfectly over my jacket or sweater and I feel a lot more visible to drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Az H.

customer_reviews.title: You can see me coming!
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight, but easy to see, as I am a bicycle rider and need to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: It is lightweight and will be perfect for use in all seasons
customer_reviews.text: This really does the trick to make sure I am visible to drivers at night. It is lightweight and will be perfect for use in all seasons. i would say this definitely runs small. I am a woman size Medium and the Medium/ Large fits just right and barely over a jacket. Size up one or two sizes if you want this to fit over your winter gear. It still works though and the pocket is handy for running with my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: J.nice

customer_reviews.title: Really nice vest, but you might need a needle and thread
customer_reviews.text: I've found it surprisingly hard to find a nice running vest, but this one really fits the bill. It's lightweight, easy to get on and off, good size, good color, nice little zipper pocket on the inside etc. Only catch is that the stitching on the velcro tabs seems to come off. They replaced the first one with no hassle and no return and I could see the thread was loose on the replacement one too. But I like it enough to get some needle and thread and fix it myself so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a small/med and I can adjust it to wear over a bulky sweatshirt on cool nights or t-shirt on warm nights
customer_reviews.text: This vest fits me perfectly. Ordered a small/med and I can adjust it to wear over a bulky sweatshirt on cool nights or t-shirt on warm nights. I am 5'3" and 125lbs. I appreciate that the dimensions were given in the description as I had previously ordered from another seller a vest that didn't fit. I also love the pocket which fits amply my iphone 6 and keys. I highly recommend this item and seller. I already feel safer during my evening walks.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Walking in the evening
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy walking in the evenings and early mornings but worried about cars. This has helped me feel much better knowing the cars will be able to see me.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive reflective vest for cycling
customer_reviews.text: Quality safety item purchased to wear while motorcycling. Hi-vis yellow everywhere overlayed with reflective material. Extremely lightweight. Ordered a large. I'm 6'1", 185. Fits over my motorcycle jacket. Easy to adjust with velcro sides. Overall very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Harper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was expecting but even better quality
customer_reviews.text: This item is actually better than I expected! It has a perfect pocket for valuables on the inside and fits very nice on my body. I plan on using this while jogging for safety and it'll be perfect. It's very durable and is extremely visible to the eye from long distances! I will be purchasing more products from this company as I have had bad experiences with like products from other companies but this is a company I can trust! Thank you Flectson!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Woo

customer_reviews.title: very happy ordering another
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly, lightweight but very visible should be great for summer as well, nice pocket that holds cell phone, very happy ordering a 2nd one today for my husband
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great! It fits perfectly and is very comfortable to wear. I’m now visible on my evening walk with my dog and feel much safer.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug and comfortably. Velcro seems strong and durable. Snazzy pocket is large enough to accommodate phone, wallet, and snack.
customer_reviews.author: Noreegret

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a lightweight vest!
customer_reviews.text: Knowing I was going to winter in Florida, I wanted a vest to wear cycling that was close to the body and not cumbersome and hot. When I received this one and tried it on, I quickly ordered one for my husband. The little pouch in front is just big enough to hold my cell phone. I heartily recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayakinggoddess

customer_reviews.title: Light, Bright, and Reflective
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something small and simple I could throw on when I go running near dusk with my dog. Works great for that. Only complaint is that the Velcro closures around the waist are at the same height as my hands when running, so they drag on the flap closure which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Great vest at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I used this vest for an overnight run in a Ragnar race & loved it! Size ran a bit larger than expected (unlike other reviews). I usually wear S/M. I ordered medium, and then had to reorder small. I was careful with the velcro attachments, and had no issues with stitching (unlike other reviews). The only issue I had was size adjustment (limited tightening) and very slight chafing where one arm brushed up against the side flap during a training run (only once), but overall - it's great vest at a great price. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather J

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the coverage I need
customer_reviews.text: Pros: reflective strips work like a charm Cons: the fit is awkward, which I should have realized but I didn’t. Ladies who are well-endowed: it’s a little like wearing a racerback tank backward. Not totally, but definitely enough.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: L/XL size for adults
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my jogs at night. The reflective material works as stated. As another reviewer noted, the L/XL size is meant for adults. I wear a medium/large in men's shirts, and the L/XL fits snuggly around my upper torso. The included pocket is useful for carrying your ID but not really for keys or anything bulky lke a phone (unless you carry your phone without a case). In all, a useful product for what it's for: to let motorists see you in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Be noticed when running
customer_reviews.text: this vest is exactly what I needed. It is extremely bright and have several reflective pieces. Cars mive over much earlier when I am wearing my vest. The pocket is good for holding my phone and car key. The only thing I would like better is two separate zip pockets amd one to be small so phone doesn’t bounce.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn Caudill

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use the reflective for biking to work and back (night shift). The biggest problem I have with the vest is that the pocket for holding things is located, when worn properly, is in the front dangling downward. I would like it better if it were reversed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander J. Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this hi Vis jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this hi Vis jacket. I live in a sticky and humid environment and this is perfect to keep me visible when cycling. I am a big fan of the front pocket (makes it easy to get to tissues etc), but i would have preferred it to be on the front for easier access.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I needed more!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is the best! Very comfortable, fits perfect, and I love the hidden pocket.
customer_reviews.author: krescandon

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for cycling, since it's getting darker in the mornings when I ride on the back roads. The vest is reasonably snug so it doesn't catch air, but it's not so tight that I even notice I'm wearing it. The neck is wide enough that it doesn't get in the way of my jacket collar, and the waist is adjustable to fit appropriately whether I'm wearing my jacket or not. Reflective patches are wide and visible, and the front pocket is big enough for my phone. No complaints, no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Nygard

customer_reviews.title: The pouch is useful.
customer_reviews.text: I can slip it over my head without undoing the Velcro. The pouch is useful.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A.

customer_reviews.title: The price is great and the velcro means he can wear it over ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, for his walks in our rural neighborhood. There are no sidewalks and no streetlights. If he walks later in the day, the vest makes him much more visible. The price is great and the velcro means he can wear it over varying clothing layers.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine B. Church

customer_reviews.title: Effective  and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I run in the early morning so I needed a proper reflective vest to keep me safe. The color and fabric on this vest are good quality and most importantly the reflective strips are significantly wide so they do not blend in with my surroundings. My only disappointment is that the zippered pocket is also made of the same breathable material as the rest of the best and is not waterproof. Waterproof pocketing would have made this vest perfect
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for running and bicycling in the pre dawn hours or just before the sun sets.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great color and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great color and quality! The pocket is large enough for a cell phone, it pulls the vest forward and down if anything heavy is in there. It is a great fit for a male. As a female I have a big chest and it is a little awkward but I really like the quality and price so I intend to deal with it. It is very reflective and bright so I believe it will do the job well of keeping me safe while running.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So, I don't give 5 stars unless the product absolutely wows me. That being said, there is nothing wrong with this product. Shipped fast, looks good and fits great. I bought this to be visible when I run at night and it will do that flawlessly. Bright yellow and reflective. The pocket is a bonus. There isn't a sizing chart but I went with the size I would buy in a jacket and it will fit over my clothes just fine. It connects at the sides with velcro so there is some flexibility. Bottom line - I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Vanderlip

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, nice addition with the pocket for electronics!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the way the vest fits and the pocket is great for your cell phone. I ordered based off the directions picture that only shows three sizes and missed the fact there was an XL size option. At 5'11" 250, I defiantly need the extra large. I would not be able to velcro the sides if wearing anything other than a t-shirt. After the first time of wearing, today when I received it, the velcro patch stitching came out and is falling off.(picture attached)
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Brown

customer_reviews.title: smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Reflective vest which works well as advertised but we expected the adult medium to fit our son (he is a medium in t-shirts, weighs 160lb and is height 5'8"). It was very tight on him over a shirt, and in colder weather would need to be worn over a coat. We have now ordered a large and hope to have better luck. Apart from that it is a nice product, packs up small and gives good reflection for cycling or jogging in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size up!
customer_reviews.text: THis vest does the job I want it to do and at a reasonable price. However, it is not sized to fit over a coat or jacket for an evening walk. It is not worth the cost to exchange it for a larger size. So if you plan to wear it over outerwear, get at least a size larger than what you wear.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Good reflective vest
customer_reviews.text: Good reflective vest. Works well for running. The velcro is right under the arms and sometimes gets scratchy so I usually wear it backwards. I would probably get a pull over vest if I got another one to avoid the velcro issue. The pouch is also helpful to bring car keys and a cell phone with me.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Good for pedestrians and cyclists
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and visible by drivers in early morning hours. This vest visibility alerts drivers and it is notable because vehicles are slowing down. I wear it as a pedestrian and cyclist. Easy to attach, though if you're using a backpack the back velcros of the vest will attach to your backpack and you will not be able to close the vest. The front stays put. I like the inside zipper for your phone, glasses, etc. I ordered a large for allowance for the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Passions

customer_reviews.title: I love the pocket inside
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to walk/jog with my dog in the wee hours of the morning. I love the pocket inside; it's large enough to fit my phone and keys. It also fits well, although I would say it's a little short. I guess I should have measured the proposed length of it on my body before I bought it. Overall, great buy for the money though. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.  Light weight.  Perfect for road cycling at dusk/night
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for an all-night ride that is coming up and saw this. It honestly wasn't my first choice on Amazon but my wife wanted these ones for some reason so I bought them and I couldn't be happier with them. Great quality. SOFT MATERIAL. Very comfortable. I'm glad I have them and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Bright, but shoddy stitching
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for myself and my husband for a mountain biking trip since it’s hunting season. The fit is good, they are very vivid and the reflective strips are great, however the stitching is shoddy. The pocket in one missed the stitching at the bottom and has a 3+ inch hole, plus more areas where the binding didn’t catch in the stitching and will be leading to holes. I kept it because I need it for this weekend, but if this is a representation of quality, I’ll look elsewhere for more for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: SSwilley

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for walking too..............
customer_reviews.text: We are not all runners! Some people walk daily for exercise. My friend and I walk 5 - 6 days per week after work. In the Winter this means in the dark. I purchased a pair of XL to wear over our Winter Coats. We glow safely in the dark! People don't realize that even at dusk a driver can't always see a walker or runner. I know while driving at dusk or after I have seen a walker too late to stop had they been in my path. It is not fair to drivers to scare them or worse. These vests are the answer!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon's 01

customer_reviews.title: Save up for a brand name vest
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable. I had an old Nathan’s running vest I was hoping to replace as much of the reflective had worn off, but I’ll keep using it. This one has very stiff mesh and has a much bulkier design. And there is a zipper on the inside chest area, who would want that rubbing against them. Sad I missed the return window on this one. Would be fine if worn over coats only.
customer_reviews.author: Proctor

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! SIZES NOT CORRECT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I ordered these vests to throw on to walk the dog in the evening, as our neighborhood is dark, not many street lights. While lightweight, the vests are SO VERY INCORRECTLY SIZED!!!!! Order at least one size up. I don't have the chart in front of me, but according to its measurements, I should be wearing a medium- not a chance! I took my husband's large, which just barely fit, ordered and XL for him, and again, it barely fits. Order with time to return and move up a size- they came quickly. Lightweight, perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ann A.

product_meta.title: Reflective Vest for Running or Cycling (Women and Men, with Pocket, Gear for Jogging, Biking, Motorcycle, Walking)
product_meta.description:
STAY SAFE WITH THE FLECTSON REFLECTIVE VEST!

Are you anxious to stay visible while running, jogging or biking?

Are you in search of a safety vest that doesn’t compromise comfort?

Then look no further; the Flectson Reflective Vest is exactly what you need! Made of 100% knitted polyester, this reflective vest is visible from 650 feet, which makes it the perfect choice for athletes, runners, bikers, and even children! The mesh fabric makes the Flectson Reflective Vest literally weightless, so you don’t feel you’re wearing an extra layer while exercising. Available in 4 sizes, the adjustable closures allow you to easily secure the vest for a comfortable, custom fit.

The Flectson Reflective Vest also has an inside zippered pocket to hold any small electronic device you may want to keep safe on you while out running. As an added benefit, the vest is EN471 compliant, keeping you completely safe, and signalling your presence to cars in order to prevent undesired accidents. What’s more, the vest is machine washable, which means that you can safely wash it and it won’t lose its shape or quality.

If you’re planning to go running any time soon, consider the pros of the Flectson Reflective Vest:

The vest is made of 100% knitted polyester

You can customize the fit and size of the vest with the adjustable closures

Keep your electronic gadgets safe in the inside zippered pocket

You will be highly visible to oncoming traffic

Your vest will retain its shape and quality even after multiple washes

Get a vest in size XS, S/M, M/L or L/XL for all runners, joggers, athletes, kids and adults.

Measurements:

S/M 36"-40" waist 18" long measuring from the shoulder 

M/L 40"-44" waist 20" long 

L/XL 44"-48" waist 22" long

These dimensions are approximate. Size up or down according to the type of clothing you'll wear underneath.

CLICK “Add to Cart” to get your reflective vest today!
